description:
This is an award for those of you that have been part of our first DAO Pioneer learning circle Which started in November 2021 in the IOTA Discord. 
If you have been following the course we will grant you a badge and 2 XP.

To make that you have been part of it, please put proof of your Discord account in the application. Please mention the account with the Discord tag. Like this: 
Holger / Phylo [IF]#2233
name: IOTA DAO Pioneers OG first class of 2021 member
